name: Coven Con
description:
Coven Con is a fantastical event that invites witches of every kind to come together as a community. In some worlds this maybe like our own conventions; with panels, guests, artist alleys etc. In other worlds it might be a macabre night market; and rituals performed at the dead of night.

 

Play as whimsical witches in this D6 dice pool game for 3 - 7 players. Discover and solve your own magical misadventures set up by your convention's coordinator.  Overcome odds with the power of your coven.

 

Included in this you gain the rules of play, the magic of made family and 6 witchy playbooks; Art, Beast, Garden, Lunar, Tea and Solar.

This work is based on the Buddy System, published by Jessica Marcrum. The Buddy System is licensed for use under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
